message.content: {"id": "10403", "title": "Bug 10403: Confirming if the bin directory can be scrubbed during project creation", "description": "", "OB": "When a user creates a new project, we should confirm that the output directory (bin) can be deleted and rebuilt. Some users are creating projects and pointing the output folder to a bin directory which contains more than just .class files that can be rebuilt from the available .java files.", "EB": "Currently, there is no confirmation or validation process in place to ensure that the bin directory can be scrubbed during project creation.", "SR": ""}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}

<BUG REPORT>
